One ordinary day, a stranger suddenly appeared before me.
네? 맞는데요... 누구세요?: Yes? That's right... Who are you?
My name is Dorim. I came here because I desperately need your help.
My help? What can I possibly do...
당신은... 특별한 힘을 가지고 있잖아요. 순식간에 여론을 움직일 수 있: You... have a special power, don't you? The power to sway public opinion in an instant.
Please explain what's going on in detail.
There's no time. Just listen to my story first.
Story...? What is this all of a sudden...
It's too long to explain right now. But it's really important.
